TopicTitle: How/Can I transfer monopropellant into a separate tank. Xbox One

Articles.Content: Is is possible to transfer monopropellant without having a direct route to a different tank. Do you have to have a docking port coming off from the monopropellant tank itself, thanks

Welcome to the forums!

Can you describe the situation in more detail? It can depend on which parts are on the route between one tank and the other.

it depends on your difficulty.  if your playing on normal, they essentially just need to be attached to the same vessel. you need the research lab to be upgraded atleast once. select both tanks so that the only 2 part windows open are the 2 tanks, and you should get little in/out buttons.

if your playing on hard, you need to obey crossfeed rules.
